revised_title: The Function and Evolutionary Significance of Vascular Filaments in Lepidosiren
tldr: The author investigates the function of vascular filaments on the pelvic limbs of the fish species Lepidosiren. They suggest that these filaments supply oxygen to the eggs and larvae, providing a crucial role in the fish's reproductive process. This discovery contributes to the understanding of the evolution and biology of this unique species.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Fish Biology
